_comment: Gemini API configuration for PRIME ecosystem. Copy to gemini_config.json and fill in your keys.
_setup: Get API key from https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey | Get Jules key from jules.google Settings

flash_lite.use_case: Bulk classification, simple extraction, routine labeling

flash_2.use_case: Fast general tasks, document summarization, data parsing

flash_25.use_case: Default workhorse — good quality, low cost, thinking capability

flash_3.use_case: Latest flash model — best quality/cost ratio

pro_3.use_case: Frontier reasoning — only for hardest problems
